name: Unboxing
description:
Unboxing offers a meditative and relaxing experience. Satisfy your mind while unboxing, scraping, and selling intrinsic items.
Use drones to automate your job and watch them work for you.
Upgrade to new contracts and increase your chance to unbox more items.


Before you buy
I created Unboxing to reach a personal goal: Develop the best game I could, with good quality, visuals, and audio, in a determined period.
  • No, I didn't model all the objects myself.
  • No, we don't have triple-A features.
  • No, we don't have Hollywood soundtracks.

What you should expect
  • Satisfying and Relaxing Soundtrack
  • Futuristic Environment
  • 12 Different Crates to Unbox
  • 47 Different Items to Loot
  • Cool Diegetic UI

What you should not expect
  • Massive Multiplayer Online
  • Violence and Gore
  • Pay to Win Store
  • Advertisements
